documentation.synopsis:
This app can connect to Tritech Sonars Miniking and Micron. The app will publish SOME_VAR_MICRON or SOME_VAR_MINIKING regarding the sonar that is plugged.
The app subscribe to *_PARAMS, *_POLL and POWERED_* with *={MINIKING_MICRON} regarding which sonar you wish to control.
Range = [2;100] in meters Gain =[0;100] Initial Gain of the receiver in percent 0..100%, from doc, was in unit 0..210 = 0..+80dB = 0..100%, typically 20 percent Continuous = {0,false,1,true} if false, scan sector defined by RightLeftLimits, continuous otherwise. VoS = Velocity of sound in m/s, typically 1500m/s invert = 0=Upright, 1=Inverted Orientation nBins = [200] Number of bins generated after a ping AngleStep = In degrees: Ultimate Resolution (0.225째), Mgr Resolution (0.45째), Medium Resolution (0.9째), Low Resolution (1.8째) LeftLimit = For a sector scan (Continuous = {0,false}), in degrees RightLimit = For a sector scan (Continuous = {0,false}), in degrees

uPokeDB MINIKING_PARAMS="Range=25,Gain=45,Continuous=true, VoS=1500, invert=1, nBins=200, AngleStep=, LeftLimit=, RightLimit="!!!Gain in percent
MICRON_PARAMS string uPokeDB MINIKING_PARAMS="Range=25,Gain=45,Continuous=true, VoS=1500, invert=1, nBins=200, AngleStep=, Gain=, LeftLimit=, RightLimit="
MICRON_POLL int if 0, sonar don't send mtSendData and polling is off. When switching to 1, Sonar start polling if initialized
POWERED_MINIKING int if 0, the sonar is not initialized and listenning thread is stopped, when switching from 0 to 1, thread is launched an sonar init process or polling started
POWERED_MICRON int if 0, the sonar is not initialized and listenning thread is stopped, when switching from 0 to 1, thread is launched an sonar init process or polling started
